fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Poison someone each night, if they get protected by an ability or have Defense, this will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Poison will Frame your targets 1 night after use, Frames last for the night they were set.
- Framed targets appear as Framer (74)
- You are always Rule 17d, you are too strong for any balanced list.
